Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Fluorescent microscope (488 nm excitation filter, 510 nm color separator, 520 nm blocking filter, 100 W mercury vapour lamp or LED bluelight)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for EUROIMMUN IFA 40: HEp-20-10 indirect immunofluorescence assay for detection of ANA in serum to aid diagnosis of systemic rheumatic diseases
Indications for Use Summary: Indirect immunofluorescence antibody test for qualitative or semi-quantitative detection of antibodies against cell nuclei (ANA) in human serum, used as an aid in the diagnosis of systemic rheumatic diseases with other clinical and laboratory findings
